thread.title: Thaikkudam Bridge is all set to launch their debut album
thread.title_full: Thaikkudam Bridge is all set to launch their debut album - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: Thaikkudam Bridge is all set to launch their debut album
text:
'Navarasam', which has nine songs, takes the title from a number 'Navarasam' that is dedicated to Kathakali.
It talks about the commercialization of the art form. It is a classic rock number sung by Vipin Lal and written by Dhanya Suresh, in Manipravalam, which is often used in padams. 'One', the first song of their debut album, Navarasam, and the video of the song has gone viral on the net.
